Up to $10,000 worth of tools taken in Grey Lynn, Auckland burglary https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/up-to-10000-worth-of-tools-taken-in-grey-lynn-auckland-burglary/JNGIUJVQKJBOBGFI2XW36JMYWA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/up-to-10000-worth-of-tools-taken-in-grey-lynn-auckland-burglary/JNGIUJVQKJBOBGFI2XW36JMYWA/ David WilliamsThe owner said the burglary has left his children feeling nervous and shaken. Weather: Thunderstorms hit Auckland, Northland; Wellington braces for 100km/h gusts, hail https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thunderstorms-to-hit-auckland-northland-wellington-braces-for-100kmh-gusts-hail/UWIDP2KARNAT7LBDWRV4X245F4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thunderstorms-to-hit-auckland-northland-wellington-braces-for-100kmh-gusts-hail/UWIDP2KARNAT7LBDWRV4X245F4/ There is a risk of flooding as the upper North Island is soaked by the storms. Prolific aggravated robber Zane Smith forced to serve 50% of sentence https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prolific-aggravated-robber-zane-smith-forced-to-serve-50-of-sentence/TBUIZ7MGBVDVPF6FM75YP4MXR4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prolific-aggravated-robber-zane-smith-forced-to-serve-50-of-sentence/TBUIZ7MGBVDVPF6FM75YP4MXR4/ Belinda FeekThe 20-year-old was not long out of jail when he robbed a bottle store. Mon, 16 Dec 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Zane Smith and four others stormed the Bottle-O at Manchester Place, Te Rapa, before fleeing with $10,000 worth of cigarettes and alcohol. Photo / Facebook
The chase is over - rain ends Napier hopes of schools cricket title https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/the-chase-is-over-rain-ends-napier-hopes-of-schools-cricket-title/BOHJ3PU4ZJBO5C7LTXQTUWTR54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/the-chase-is-over-rain-ends-napier-hopes-of-schools-cricket-title/BOHJ3PU4ZJBO5C7LTXQTUWTR54/ Doug LaingNapier went into last match unbeaten in five consecutive run chases. Mon, 16 Dec 2024 06:48:16 +0000 The Napier Boys High School First XI at the national secondary schools cricket tournament in Christchurch, where a countback-loss in the final match, against 12-times winners Christchurch BHS, ended Napier's hopes of winning the title for a first time. Photo / Supplied.

Whakaari/White Island aviation code raised to orange https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sunlive/news/whakaariwhite-island-aviation-code-raised-to-orange/ZHG62D4OX5HAFDOY5YM62HZOEQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sunlive/news/whakaariwhite-island-aviation-code-raised-to-orange/ZHG62D4OX5HAFDOY5YM62HZOEQ/ Rosalie Liddle CrawfordThe aviation colour code for White Island has been raised to orange.
